description.en:
Alvida, the Demon Queen, was defeated by the Hero, but she will be allowed to stay alive under one condition, which is "be his wife?!".
___
Original comic posted by PeaCh88 on twitter.

[**Author's Twitter**](https://twitter.com/pcmaniac88)    
[**Patreon**](https://www.patreon.com/PeaCh88)
description.pt-br: Alvida, a Rainha Demônio, foi derrotada pelo Herói, mas ela poderá ficar viva sob uma condição, que é "ser sua esposa?!".

altTitles.ja: Tomo Chan ha Onnanoko!
トモちゃんは女の子!

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

title.en: Kimi Shi ni Tamafu Koto Nakare

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi Shi ni Tamafu Koto Nakare

altTitles.en: You Must Not Give Yourself to Death

altTitles.ja: 君死ニタマフ事ナカレ

description.en: In the future, supernatural powers not only exist but have become science fact. The “Special Abilities Private High School” is established in order to utilize students’ powers for the military. Students are roped onto the battlefield without knowing the meaning of the fight, whether it will save their lives…or spell their demise.
description.pt-br: No futuro, poderes sobrenaturais não apenas existem, como também se tornaram fatos científicos. O "Colégio Particular de Habilidades Especiais" foi criado para que esses poderes fossem utilizados para o exército. Estudantes são jogados no campo de batalha sem saber o porquê de estarem lutando, se isso salvará suas vidas... ou acabará com elas.

title.en: I Got a Girlfriend From a Shooting Star

altTitles.zh: 许愿后，天降成精的星星

altTitles.zh-ro: Xǔyuàn hòu, tiān jiàng chéng jīng de xīngxīng

altTitles.en: After Making a Wish, a Shooting Star Descended and Became a Spirit

description.en: What do I do if I like girls? I wished upon a shooting star, not expecting it to be granted straight away… so why did a spirit suddenly appear before me?

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.fr: My Love Story With Yamada-Kun at LVL 999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?
___
The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: まやか姉さんは噓がつけない

description.en:
Junya is a third-year junior high school student. He's good at sports, but when it comes to studying... well, let's just say he's really bad at it. 

Lately, he's been troubled by something. His childhood friend, Mayaka-nee, has been messing with him in all sorts of ways! Could it be that she actually likes him...? 

Thus begins the romantic comedy where our hero is at the mercy of a deceptive, ever-changing heroine!
description.ja:
中学3年生の純也。運動は得意だけど、勉強はちょっと…というか凄く苦手。

そんな彼には最近、悩みがある。幼なじみのまやか姉さんが、なんやかんやと、ちょっかいを出してくるのだ！まさか俺に気があるってこと…!?

変幻自在の嘘つきヒロインに翻弄される騙されラブコメ、開幕！
description.pt-br:
Junya é um aluno do terceiro ano do ensino médio. Ele é bom em esportes, mas quando se trata de estudar... bem, digamos que ele é muito ruim nisso. 

Ultimamente, ele tem sido incomodado por algo. Sua amiga de infância, Mayaka-nee, tem mexido com ele de todas as maneiras! Será que ela realmente gosta dele...? 

Assim começa a comédia romântica onde nosso herói está à mercê de uma heroína enganosa e em constante mudança!

description.en:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.ja: ビビッド・モンスターズ・クロニクル

description.en: In order to achieve her goal Yumeko Makino starts the game "Vivid Monsters Chronicle." This manga follows her and her friends who she meets along the way, in game and in real life.
description.ja: とある目的のため、ネットゲーム『ビビッド・モンスターズ・クロニクル』（通称：ビビモン）を始めた夢子。ゲーム内で偶然助けてくれた女の子がとても内気なクラスメイトで…!?個性豊かなキャラクター達がゲームの内外で心を通じ合わせる『ビビモン』の世界へ、いざ！

altTitles.ja: なぜだ内藤

description.en: "I love you! Let's get married!" That is how Itou's first encounter with Naitou went on their first day of school. Since then, Naitou has been relentless; proposing to Itou at every opportunity and singing his love for her. But Itou is no obedient goodie-goodie to just sit back and let Naitou do as he pleases. Firing back with her own diatribes, she is determined to fight this out till the end. A comedic tale of two twisted idiots and a boy's neverending pursuit to get his girl… even if that girl absolutely hates him.

It starts with a mountain. A strategic leader gets isekai-ed into a war dynasty. He only has a group of members who were planning to ditch him. Facing this war era, he thinks of stealing food and girls to live a king’s life. He is hot-blooded, picks fights with war heroes. How will he bring chaos to the war? Will he be able to rise up high?

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

altTitles.ja: 惚れ薬が効かない助手

altTitles.en: Assistant Who is Immune to Love Potion
An Assistant Immune to Love Potions

altTitles.ja: ロイヤル・マリッジ

description.en:
The symbol of beauty and money, Tatiana Cartien, the most eligible bachelorette of the Freya Empire. The despair of being betrayed by her trusted fiancé lasted only a moment, as who could've known a bigger shock would happen.

"I'll only endure for a few days, getting discovered in an idiotic manners of all ways."

To think that her family, who she believed was on her side, knew her fiancé's nature. Tatiana threatened to never get married, and her mother, who once coddled her, abandoned her.

"If you say you don't want to then I guess you should leave this house."

"..."

"Of course, you should leave behind everything I've given to you."

The time she has left is one week. If she can't find someone worth marrying, she'll be kicked out onto the streets with nothing.

Just when she thought, "Is this the end?" one person came to mind! Kainel Towncent, an illegitimate child who had once been treated with contempt, who then rose from mercenary to the hailed war hero of Freya in 3 years.

A road with a dead end, there's nothing left to lose. In order to survive in this grim world, grabbing the hand of the devil is enough.

"Tatiana Cartien. No matter what anyone says from now on, you're the lady of Towncent. If you come to me with an offer of marriage first, then you need to take responsibility until the end."

---
As the beloved daughter of a viscountess and the fiancée of a duke, Tatiana Cartienne was the belle of high society. But when she refuses to marry after discovering the duke's infidelity, she begins to see that she was simply a pawn in her family's power play. In her attempt to break free, she turns to Kynell Townsend, a war hero who was once humiliated by the viscountess for his attempt to woo Tatiana. With title and fortune out of the picture, will they be able to reset their love story?
description.fr: Fille adorée d'une vicomtesse et fiancée d'un duc, Tatiana Cartien était la fleur de la haute société. Mais lorsqu'elle refuse de se marier après avoir découvert l'infidélité du duc, elle commence à comprendre qu'elle n'était qu'un pion dans l’échiquier du pouvoir de sa famille. Pour tenter de se libérer de cette dernière, elle se tourne vers Kainel Towncent, un héros de guerre qui a été humilié quelques années plutôt par la vicomtesse pour avoir tenté de séduire Tatiana. Sans titre ni fortune, parviendront-ils à relancer leur histoire d'amour ?
description.ru: Татьяне Картье осталась неделя чтобы найти мужа, после того, как он предал её. Последним, о ком она думала, был наёмник Кайнел Таунсенд. Она решает более никому не доверять, и заключить с ним брак по контракту, но... Почему её сердце так быстро бьётся?
description.uk:
Символ краси і грошей, Татьяна Картьє - найшанованіша наречена в імперії Фрея. 
ЇЇ розпач від зради власного нареченого тривав лише одну мить, адже хто б знав, що далі справи підуть тільки гірше.

"Міг почекати декілька днів, а не попастися як ідіот." 

Я вірила, що моя родина на моїй стороні, але вони знали про зраду мого нареченого. Через свої погрози, що вона ніколи не вийде заміж, мати Татьяни, яка так сильно любила її, відвернулася від неї. 
Якщо тобі щось не подобається, то можеш забиратися геть.
“... “
І звісно ж, ти повинна залишити все, що я тобі дала.
У неї залишився всього лиш тиждень. Якщо вона за цей час вона не знайде собі чоловіка, її виженуть на вулицю ні з чим.

І в мить, коли вона подумала:”Це кінець”, на думку спала одна людина!
Кайнель Таунсент, позашлюбна дитина до якої ставилися з презирством, який за три роки прославився, як герой війни Фреї.

Загнана в глухий кут, де немає нічого втрачати. Для виживання в цьому світі, потрібно схопити диявола за руку

“Татьяна Картьє, щоб хто не казав, але віднині ви леді Таунсест.
Якщо ти перша запропонувала мені одружитися, то будь готова взяти на себе відповідальність до самого кінця.”

title.en: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru

altTitles.ja: 茉莉花ちゃんの好感度はぶっ壊れている

altTitles.id: Status Bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka Marika-chan rusak

altTitles.en: Marika-chan's affection meter is completely broken.

altTitles.es-la: El Medidor De Afecto De Marika-San Esta Completamente Roto

altTitles.pt-br: O medidor de afeto da Marika-chan está completamente quebrado.

description.en:
I’ve gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.──I don’t have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?

Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan’s meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

Marika-chan, you don’t like me, so why are you so kind to me...?
──What is Marika-chan’s hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?
description.id:
Aku tiba-tiba bisa melihat tingkat rasa suka dari gadis yang kusukai.──Aku tidak punya keberanian untuk menyatakan cinta pada teman masa kecilku, Marika-chan. Suatu hari, aku membuat permohonan yang sangat kuat pada bintang jatuh: "Aku berharap bisa memahami perasaan orang lain, seperti di dalam game romansa." Dan ternyata, permohonan itu terkabul...!?

Di atas kepala para gadis di kelasku, muncul status bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka. Dalam kebingunganku melihat pemandangan aneh ini, aku memutuskan untuk memeriksa status barnya Marika-chan. Namun, status barnya justru melebihi batas, berubah menjadi status bar "neraka" yang benar-benar kacau...!?

Marika-chan, kalau kau tidak menyukaiku, kenapa kau begitu baik padaku...?
──Apa rahasia sebenarnya di balik sikap Marika-chan yang manis dan menggemaskan? Apakah dia benar-benar membenciku!? Atau mungkin sebenarnya...!?
description.ja:
あらすじ・内容
好きな子からの好感度が見えるようになりました。──幼馴染の茉莉花ちゃんに告白する勇気の無い僕。ある日、流れ星に強く願った「恋愛ゲームみたいに相手の気持ちがわかるようになりますように」すると、その願いは叶ってしまい…!?クラスの女子達に浮かぶ好感度メーター。非現実な光景に戸惑いながらも茉莉花ちゃんのを見に行くと、下限突破した地獄のメーターになっていて…!?茉莉花ちゃん、僕のこと嫌いなのにどうしてそんなに優しかったの…？――裏アリ可愛い茉莉花ちゃんの隠された本音は？本当にキライなの!?それとも…!?
description.pt-br:
Eu ganhei a habilidade de ver os níveis de afeição da garota de quem gosto. ──Eu não tenho coragem de confessar meus sentimentos à minha amiga de infância, Marika-chan. Um dia, fiz um desejo forte a uma estrela cadente: "Eu queria poder entender os sentimentos dos outros, como em um jogo de namoro." Então, esse desejo se tornou realidade...!?

Flutuando acima das garotas da minha turma estão medidores de afeição. Enquanto fico confuso com essa visão surreal, decido verificar o medidor da Marika-chan, apenas para descobrir que ele ultrapassou os limites, transformando-se em um medidor infernal...!?

Marika-chan, você não gosta de mim, então por que é tão gentil comigo...?
──Qual é a verdade oculta de Marika-chan por trás de sua fachada fofa? Ela realmente me odeia!? Ou é algo mais...?

title.en: Nee, Boku ga Inai to Shinutte Itte yo

altTitles.ja: ねえ、僕がいないと死ぬって言ってよ

altTitles.ja-ro: Nee, Boku ga Inai to Shinutte Itte yo

altTitles.en: Hey, tell me you will die without me

altTitles.zh-hk: 吶，說說看要是沒有我會死嘛

description.en:
"Will this love lead to happiness or despair?"
Toruka is in a relationship with Iori, an ideal high-spec boyfriend who is the envy of everyone, and she is enjoying smooth sailing in both her private and public life.
One year into their relationship, she receives a marriage proposal from Iori, who asks her to stay by his side for the rest of their lives.
She is elated, but then she discovers that someone is stalking her.
She enlists the help of her childhood friend Jin to find the culprit, but ......?
24-hour surveillance, eavesdropping, tailing...the yandere boy's warped love and obsession run amok never ceases in this dicey romance...!
description.ja:
この愛のいきつく先は幸せか、それとも絶望かーー？
誰もが羨む理想のハイスぺ彼氏・伊織と交際し、公私ともに順風満帆な日々を送る透花。
交際スタートから1年、伊織から「一生側にいてほしい」と結婚の申し出を受ける。
喜びに浮かれる透花だったが、そんな時、誰かにストーキングされていることが発覚。
幼馴染の陣に協力してもらい犯人探しをするが……!?
24時間監視・盗聴・尾行…ヤンデレ男子の歪んだ愛と執着心の暴走が止まらないサイコロマンスが幕を開けるーー！

---
這段愛情的盡頭是幸福，抑或是絕望呢――？
與人人稱羨的理想極品男友·伊織交往，於公於私都過著順風順水的日子的透花。
開始交往後的１年，由伊織提出了「希望你能一輩子陪伴在右」的求婚。
沈浸在喜悅之中的透花，就在此時，發現似乎被誰給跟蹤著。
並在青梅竹馬的陣的幫助之下找尋犯人……！？
24小時監視·監聽·跟蹤…無法制止病嬌男子扭曲的愛與暴走的執著心之精神病羅曼史就此展開序幕――！
description.zh-hk:

與人人稱羨的理想極品男友·伊織交往，於公於私都過著順風順水的日子的透花。

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới sau ngày Diệt Vong

description.en:
Faced with imminent defeat and certain death, would you choose to run – or continue to fight for a doomed world?

When mysterious towers appear across the world, summoning monsters that prey on mankind, this is the choice presented to the Tower Walkers – adventurers with special powers to fight the monsters.

On the brink of death, they can choose to use a “regression stone” to return to the past for a second chance, though this decision places them in a separate timeline forever.

Stubborn Tower Walker Jaehwan rejects this choice, choosing to fight for the original timeline, and learning shocking secrets about the Tower along the way.
description.ko:
<전지적 독자 시점> 싱숑 작가 원작.

이것은 모두가 과거로 돌아갈 때 마지막까지 회귀하지 않았던 한 사나이의 이야기다.
description.pt-br: Esta é a história de um homem que não voltou quando todos retornaram ao passado. Os humanos foram convocados de repente para se tornarem “Andarilhos” e precisavam limpar a torre para salvar o mundo… 77º Andar: A Pedra do Retorno foi descoberta. Andarilhos podiam agora retornar ao passado. Lentamente, todos foram embora… A última esperança da humanidade, “Carpe Diem”, foi formada com as pessoas que se recusaram a abandonar o mundo… O último Andarilho chegou ao 100º andar. Ele não sabia mais no que crer. Obs.: Essa é a adaptação da novel que existe dentro da novel/manhwa Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint e que o protagonista lê em sua juventude.

title.en: Tenkousaki ni Oshi no Maid ga Ita

altTitles.ja: 転校先に推しのメイドがいた

altTitles.en: I Met My Favorite Maid at My Transfer School

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Liệu Cậu Sẽ Kết Thúc Mối Tình Này Chứ?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi: Yuzu là một fan hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka. Cô không có người bạn nào hay gia đình quan tâm tới cô cả, Madoka là niềm an ủi duy nhất của cô ấy. Sachiko là bạn thân của Madoka, cô cũng là người mà Yuzu ghét nhất. Để trút giận, Yuzu đã mở một tài khoản riêng tư nơi mà cô đăng những lời ác ý về Sachiko. Khi Sachiko phát hiện ra, cô đã thử kết bạn với Yuzu và đề nghị sẽ cho cô ấy cơ hội nói chuyện với Madoka. Tuy nhiên, một tai nạn đã xảy ra và họ hoán đổi cơ thể cho nhau, trong khi đó Sachiko bị rơi vào hôn mê.

altTitles.ja: 南條さんは僕に抱かれたい

altTitles.en: Nanjou-san Wants to Be Held by Me

altTitles.pt-br: Nanjou-san quer ser segurada por mim

description.en: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.
description.ja: 陰キャな清己が忘れ物を取りに戻った放課後の教室。ギャルで有名な南條さんと男子生徒が、○○○しようとしているところを目撃する。逃げ出した男子生徒の代わりに…と誘われるものの、潔癖症の清己はきっぱり断ることに。けれど、それによって興味を持たれてしまい、清己は南條さんに付きまとわれることに！けれど、南條さんは、意外とオタクにとっての理想のギャルで…!?
description.pt-br: Do pior encontro deles surge uma história sobre sua felicidade final! Esta comédia romântica explora os altos e baixos de um relacionamento sério.

description.en: Bully × The first love of many, an interpretation of the deepest love. Reborn as a high school sophomore, it was the best year in Meng Ting's short life. She wants to live it to the fullest, she wants to dance again, and never mess with the demonic boy who later raises his butcher knife - Jiang Ren. This summer, around the corner of the school building, Meng Ting heard Jiang Ren, the bad boy, laughing wildly: "What kind of girls do I like? Girls like Meng Ting."

altTitles.ja: 愛してるゲームを終わらせたい

altTitles.en: I Want to End This Love Game

altTitles.fr: Je veux finir le jeu du "je t'aime"

altTitles.th: เกมสารภาพรักนี้น่ะเรามาจบกันเถอะ

altTitles.zh: 想让“我爱你”游戏快点结束

altTitles.fr: Je veux en finir avec le jeu de l'amour

altTitles.nl: Ik wil een einde aan het liefdesspel

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero acabar com o jogo do "eu te amo"

altTitles.en: I Want to End the "I Love You" Game
I Want to End the Game That I Love

description.en: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
description.vi: Đôi bạn thuở nhỏ luôn ở bên nhau từ khi cả 2 còn bé. Cả 2 đều nhận ra tình cảm của nhau, nhưng họ quá thân thiết nên không thể thành thực. Thứ kết nối họ là trò chơi "Tớ yêu cậu" mà cả 2 đã chơi hồi còn nhỏ . Kết cục tình yêu của họ sẽ được quyết định bằng trò chơi đơn giản này khi người chiến thắng là người khiến người kia phải xấu hổ.
description.es-la: Se conocen desde que eran niños. Ambos son conscientes de lo que sienten el uno por el otro, pero están demasiado unidos como para ser sinceros. Lo único que les une es el juego "Te quiero" al que juegan desde pequeños. Si haces pasar vergüenza a tu compañero, ¡ganas!
description.pt-br: Amigos de infância que estão juntos desde que eram pequenos. Eles percebem seus sentimentos pelo outro, mas são muito próximos para serem honestos. O que os conecta é seu “jogo do eu te amo”, que eles brincam desde que eram pequenos. O fim do seu amor é decidido nesse jogo simples onde o vencedor é aquele que deixa o outro com vergonha!

description.en:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

altTitles.ja: 花秘める君のメテオール

description.en:
"On that night, I became the cursed monster's bride—"

Stella, the eldest daughter of the Viscount Quinwitch, though she was adopted, lived happily with her kind family. However, one day, Stella's younger sister Lilinette was chosen as the "Monster's Bride". Once a century, a cursed monster confined to a castle requires a sacrifice, so Stella resolves to go there in place of Lilinette. And there, she meets the monster - a bloodstained vampire named Ravi.
description.ja:
“呪われた怪物”の花嫁は皆死ぬ、それが宿命――

怪物の花嫁――それは百年に一度、国のどこかに幽閉された人ならざる魔の生き物へ捧げられる生贄……。そんな生贄に選ばれた妹を救うため、身代わりの花嫁となることを決意した子爵家の長女・ステラは、ひとりで赴いた屋敷で血塗られた吸血鬼・ラビと出会う。人を喰らう怪物として疎まれるラビの、深い孤独を知った時、ステラは……？

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
description.ja:
本物の恋心を、あなたは見抜けるか。

女性を恐れる男子高校生・大石饗。彼に突然告白してきた、5人の少女。そのうち4人は、人間の恋愛感情を喰らう生物「恋喰（こいばみ）」。彼女たちに恋愛感情を食べられると、二度と恋をすることができなくなってしまう。ただ、本当の告白をした1人の気持ちを、見捨てるわけにはいかない――饗は覚悟を決め、5人の中から、本命の1人を見つけだすことを決意する！
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

title.en: Being Loved for the First Time

altTitles.en: First Time as a Loved Youngest Child
First Time as an Adored Youngest Child

altTitles.zh: 第一次成为受宠的老幺

altTitles.es-la: Es la primera vez que me aman

altTitles.en: It's My First Time Being Loved

description.en:
As the only hope to stop the end of the world, I’ve lived 99 lives with everyone pressuring me to sacrifice myself. I dearly hoped this life would be my last…!

“A lady is born!”

I’ve ended up beginning my 100th life. They’re going to give me a hero treatment and sacrifice me again anyways. Is what I thought, but—

“Thank you for being born safely.”
“Unnie’s gon to get dem all for you!”
“Can I please see our youngest smiling as well?”
“Hey little baby, did you miss me?”

This life is a bit… weird.
description.es-la: Como la única esperanza para evitar la destrucción del mundo, esta es la 99ª vez que me veo obligada a sacrificarme. ¡Realmente esperaba que este fuera el final...! ‘¡Ha nacido una niña!’ Y así, comienza mi vida número 100. Nuevamente, me harán ser una heroína para sacrificarme, eso fue lo que pensé.  ‘Gracias por nacer a salvo.’ ‘De ahora en adelante, ¡yo té protegeré!’ ‘¿Puedes mostrarme tu rostro sonriente?’ ‘Cariño, ¿me extrañaste?’ Esta vida es un poco... ¿Rara?

altTitles.ja: スケットダンス

description.en:
The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.vi:
Tình tiết xoay quanh 3 thanh niên rảnh rỗi của câu lạc bộ SKET (chuyên giải quyết mọi rắc rối cho người khác):
- 1 nam thanh niên ngáo ngơ, chỉ thông minh lúc full trang bị.
- 1 nữ thanh niên lực lưỡng, trâu chó nhất bản đồ.
- 1 nam thanh niên Otaku chỉ nói chuyện qua laptop.

Bao gồm những câu chuyện dở khóc dở cười mà cười có khi rớt hàm mà khóc thì có khi lụt nhà -  và còn chứa rất nhiều oxi drama hít hà bổ phổi (. ❛ ᴗ ❛.)

altTitles.ja: スタジオカバナ

description.en: Yukari Maki, a diligent high school girl. One day, she spots her classmate, Yusuke Kusaka, who was rumored to be a delinquent, singing a love song. Never having imagined such a sweet, yet sad, singing voice could come from him, Yukari was instantly captivated—without knowing that it would soon be the beginning of a sad, unrequited love.
description.pt-br: Yukari Maki, uma estudante diligente do ensino médio. Um dia, ela vê seu colega de classe, Yusuke Kusaka, que dizem ser um delinquente, cantando uma canção de amor. Nunca tendo imaginado que uma voz tão doce, mas triste, pudesse vir dele, Yukari foi instantaneamente cativada - sem saber que em breve seria o início de um amor triste e não correspondido.

altTitles.ja: ヴェール

description.en:
"He", a police officer on his shift, happened to meet "her" on the streets, by chance.

Through its bold yet delicate brushwork and elegant prose, this stylish, full-colour comic
illustrates the subtle air of intimacy between these two individuals.

---
A chance encounter. A handsome policeman. A beautiful woman. A tentative love affair smolders on the snowy cobblestone streets, 
out of sight from those that might keep them apart. 

*Veil* is a beautifully illustrated full-color romance manga, told in stylish short vignettes, beautiful illustrations, and secret moments.
description.pt-br: Eles se conheceram na rua por acaso. Ele era policial e ela caminhava pela rua. Através de suas pinceladas ousadas, mas delicadas e diálogos elegantes, esta história refinada e colorida, ilustra o ar sutil da intimidade presente entre os dois.

altTitles.ja: adabana-徒花-

description.en: A girl with a rough life circumstances makes a life altering decision for the worst. In this tainted world, I shall live with the Original Sin of Purity…
description.fr: Une jeune fille aux conditions de vie difficiles prend une décision qui va changer sa vie pour le pire. Dans ce monde corrompu, je vivrai avec le péché originel de la pureté.
description.ru: В Моринаке происходит нечто диковинное для такого маленького, заснеженного городка… Убийство. Мидзуки Аикава является с повинной, утверждая, что это она убила и расчленила свою одноклассницу — Мако Игараси. Однако в исповеди преступницы чувствуется что-то неладное… Сможет ли кто-то разгадать тайну двух девочек, пытавшихся противостоять тьме этого мира?.. Узнайте в этом настоящем саспенсе!
description.uk: Дівчина з нелегкою долею вирішує змінити своє життя, однак все стає ще гірше. В цьому брудному світі я буду жити з Первородним Гріхом Чистоти.

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Месть Клеймана

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسد فيه كسلايم: انتقام كلايمان

altTitles.tr: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman'in İntikamı

altTitles.uk: Про моє переродження в слиз: Помста Клеймана

description.en: Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?
description.ja: ワルプルギスに響き渡った断末魔。道化の夢は一度は尽きたかと思われた。しかし運命のイタズラか、世界の選択か、死んだはずのクレイマンは復活し、再び暗躍を始め･･･る？
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff es una historia alternativa que sucede luego de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera.

Historia alternativa que continua despues de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera. - El Walpurgis habia terminado con el grito de su muerte. Parecia que el sueño del arlequin habia llegado a su fin. Sin embargo, ya sea por una broma del destino o una decisión del mundo, Clayman quien supuestamente murio, ha resucitado una vez mas. ¿Es el comienzo de una nueva era oscura...?

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランド オーダー－モルターリス：ステラ－

description.en: The official adaptation of the TYPE-MOON phenomenon that has become one of the most popular mobile games in the world! The year is 2016, and glitches found in humanity’s past threaten the sustainability of its future. The Chaldea Security Organization - tasked with preserving human history for as long and as strongly as possible - has developed a new method of time travel to repair these events, stabilizing humanity’s future. But when an unknown threat pushes mankind to the brink of extinction, young recruits Mash Kyrielight and Ritsuka Fujimaru find themselves at the helm of the rescue mission: Obtain the Holy Grail in a face off against fate itself …
description.id:
Tahun 2016, dan gangguan yang ditemukan di masa lalu umat manusia mengancam keberlanjutan masa depannya. Organisasi Keamanan Chaldea–yang bertugas melestarikan sejarah manusia selama dan sekuat mungkin–telah mengembangkan metode baru perjalanan waktu untuk memperbaiki peristiwa ini, menstabilkan masa depan umat manusia. Tetapi ketika ancaman yang tidak diketahui mendorong umat manusia ke ambang kepunahan, rekrutan muda Mash Kyrielight dan Ritsuka Fujimaru menemukan diri mereka di pucuk pimpinan misi penyelamatan. Dapatkan Cawan Suci dalam menghadapi takdir itu sendiri… Adaptasi resmi dari TYPE-MOON fenomena yang telah menjadi salah satu game mobile paling populer di dunia!

Holy Grail War seorang gadis dan pemuda dimulai! Mash Kyrielight yang berafiliasi dengan Organisasi Pelindung Umat Manusia, Chaldea, bergabung dalam misi melindungi sejarah umat manusia. Di hari yang sama, dia bertemu dengan seorang pemuda bernama Ritsuka Fujimaru yang tertidur di ruang istirahat..?

Didistribusi di Indonesia oleh [Gramedia](https://www.gramedia.com/products/fategrand-order-mortalis-stella-01)
description.ru: Альтернативная манга-адаптация основных сюжетных актов игры Fate/Grand Order. Покрывает акты Фуюки, Орлеан, Септем, Лондон, Камелот. Повествование ведется от лица Маш.

altTitles.ja: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

altTitles.th: ขอต้อนรับสู่ญี่ปุ่นนะ คุณเอลฟ์

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với Nhật Bản, Elf san!

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

title.en: The Too-Perfect Saint: Tossed Aside by My Fiancé and Sold to Another Kingdom

altTitles.ja: 完璧すぎて可愛げがないと婚約破棄された聖女は隣国に売られる

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaigeganai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

altTitles.en: The Saint Whose Engagement Was Broken When She Became Too Perfect Is Sold off to a Neighboring Kingdom

altTitles.th: เพราะสมบูรณ์แบบจนไม่น่ารัก สตรีศักดิ์สิทธิ์จึงถูกถอนหมั้นและขายไปอาณาจักรข้างเคียง

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaige ga nai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

description.en:
Born into a family of saints, Philia’s childhood was filled with harsh education. Nevertheless, it formed her into a great saint and secured her engagement with the second Prince, Julius. But when she became too perfect and thus not cute in his eyes, Julius broke their engagement! That's why he decided to make her leave her homeland and make her a saint for a neighboring kingdom in exchange for money and resources. Philia was prepared to be treated miserably but what awaited her was an unexpected welcome!

Confused by her new circumstances, she began to use her powers to help solve the citizens' problems such as creating a barrier against monsters and creating a cure for the illness that wreaked havoc on the land. With her new found position, Philia recollected her memories of being in a novel and the future outbreak of monsters that was to come. She used her knowledge and with the help of the people, they quickly dealt with the problem! But at the same time, the very same country that sold her off was also in danger-?!
description.ja: “聖女”を代々輩出する家系に生まれたフィリアは、幼少からのスパルタ教育により「歴代最高の聖女」と評される程の実力を身につけ、完璧に仕事をこなしていた。だが、あまりの隙のなさに「完璧すぎて可愛げがない」と腫れ物のように扱われ、婚約者の第二王子ユリウスからも婚約破棄をされてしまう――。さらに“聖女”が不在のため苦しむ隣国との取引でフィリアは、莫大な金を対価に売られることに。隣国での悲惨な扱いを覚悟するフィリアだったが、待っていたのは予想外の大歓迎で……!?
description.pt-br: A família de Philia vem produzindo santos por gerações. Não é nenhuma surpresa que ela seja conhecida como a maior santa de todos os tempos e esteja prestes a se casar com o segundo príncipe, Julius. O que ninguém espera é que Julius cancele o noivado, alegando que a perfeição de Philia a torna sem charme e antipática. Para piorar a situação, Philia é enviada para um país vizinho em troca de ouro e recursos, forçando-a a deixar sua terra natal! Apesar de se preparar para maus-tratos, Philia encontra uma recepção calorosa em sua nova cidade, onde ela faz bom uso de suas habilidades santas, erguendo barreiras contra monstros e curando epidemias. Mas enquanto ela floresce em sua nova vida, sua terra natal está sob ameaça de destruição!

altTitles.ja: 狼陛下の花嫁

description.en:
Yuurin, the daughter of a low ranking government officer, comes to the royal palace after hearing of a job with higher wages. However, that job is to act as the bride of Haku Reishou, who is feared as being the cruel and ruthless "Wolf King." In the royal palace where conspiracies swirl, after learning His Majesty's secret, Yuurin ends up stuck being his temporary bride…?!  


---
description.pl: Yuulin, córka niskiej rangi urzędnika, przybywa do królewskiego pałacu po usłyszeniu wieści o dobrze płatnej pracy. Jednakże, jak się potem okazuje, owa praca polega na odgrywaniu roli narzeczonej Reishou Haku - króla owianego złą sławą i nazywanego potocznie "Wilczym Królem". W królewskim pałacu, gdzie wszelkie plotki są na porządku dziennym, Yuulin odkrywa wielką tajemnicę władcy i zostaje jego tymczasową narzeczoną…
description.pt:
Yuurin, a filha de um oficial de baixo escalão do governo, veio para o palácio real depois de ouvir de um trabalho com salários mais altos. No entanto, esse trabalho é agir como a noiva de Haku Reishou, que é temido como o cruel e sem coração "Sua Majestade, o Lobo". No palácio real, onde a um redemoinho de conspirações, depois de aprender segredos de Sua Majestade, Yuurin acaba sendo sua esposa temporária…?  


---

description.ar: تعيش فتاة عمياء مع مخلوق غامض لكن الفتاة كانت على علم بأن هذا المخلوق ما هو إلا وحش مروع.
description.en:
The blind girl lives with a mysterious creature that somehow protects her. But the girl was aware. The creature is "a horrible monster"  
  
Note this is a oneshot that was published in two parts.
description.es: Una niña ciega convive con un monstruo de aspecto aterrador.
description.fr: Une aveugle habite avec une créature mystérieuse qui la protège quelque part. Mais, la fille est conscient: la créature est un «monstre horrible.»
description.id: Baca Manga Mienai Hito-tachi - Seorang gadis buta hidup dengan makhluk misterius yang entah bagaimana melindunginya. Tapi gadis itu sadar. Makhluk itu adalah "monster yang mengerikan".
description.ja: 目の見えない少女は"醜くおそろしい化け物"と暮らす。
description.ko: 눈이 안 보이는 소녀는 '흉측하고 무시무시한 괴물'과 함께 살고 있었다.
description.ru: Слепая девушка живет с таинственным существом, которое каким-то образом защищает ее. Но девушка была в курсе. Существо - "ужасный монстр"....
description.uk: Сліпа дівчинка живе з містичним створінням, яке якимось чином її захищає. Але дівчинка знає, що те своріння насправді є "Жахливим монстром". Чи зможе вона врятуватися від нього?
description.vi: Ngày xửa ngày xưa, có 1 cô gái mù bị giam cầm trong 1 ngôi nhà nhỏ giữa rừng dưới sự trông chừng của một sinh vật to lớn quái dị. Hằng ngày cô ta đều phải chịu đựng nỗi lo sợ rằng tới một lúc nào đó sinh vật to lớn kia sẽ ăn thịt mình, cho tới khi…

altTitles.zh-ro: Chuán Wǔ Fān Wài: Wáng Yǔ Zhuī Suí Zhě

altTitles.zh-hk: 传武番外 王与追随者

altTitles.en: Legend of Wu: The King and His Followers

description.en: Gao Jing, you're a maniac. Almost exactly like Gao Sheng was. In your eyes, is the world truly so horrid, horrid enough that you'll go to such extremes to save it? Gao Jing, are these the rules you've laid down for every sect under the sun? You're so delusional your plans are something not even your great grandfather would've dreamed off. So be it then, go and execute your plan, I want to see, if all the sects in the world will be brought to their knees in front of you, or if the Jin dynasty will be destroyed by your very hands!

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス NINE PEAKS

description.en:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ja: 真汐樂(ましおがく)は父と2人暮らしの高校1年生。入学早々上級生と乱闘騒ぎを起こし停学処分となった矢先、突然の事故で父を亡くす。父の通夜の晩に、父との思い出である堤防釣りに出かけた樂は、海に落ち22年前にタイムリープしてしまう。そして樂を海から助けたのは、他ならぬ自分と同い年の父・春実だった。春実の両親(樂の祖父母)に気に入られた樂は、宮城樂として真汐家に居候することに。そして、祖父のはからいで父と同じ青波高校に通うことになる。22年前の玖嶺の街は不良だらけ。樂は父と2人でこの街の頂点を目指す!!
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

description.en:
Kang Minhyuk suffers from a rare disorder that makes it impossible for him to stop eating. Despite strict diet and exercise, Minhyuk’s weight is now life-threatening. As a last resort, his doctor recommends a unique treatment—Athenae, a VR game where one can eat as much as they want without consequence. Crispy fried chicken! Scrumptious samgyetang! Inside Athenae, all food tastes real, but earning it is no cakewalk. In order to live, Minhyuk must go on the ultimate fantasy gourmet adventure!

description.id:
Menderita penyakit langka di mana hanya ada dua orang penderita di seluruh dunia, Minhyuk harus hidup sambil mengontrol nafsu makannya. Segala cara sudah dicoba untuk mengurangi berat badan Minhyuk, namun itu hanya semakin membuatnya lapar hingga dokter pribadinya menyarankan 'Athenae'. Sebuah VR Game di mana pemainnya bisa makan sepuasnya di dalam sana tanpa khawatir berat badan naik. Begitulah petualangan Minhyuk dimulai, tentu saja ditemani makanan-makanan lezat pada setiap quest-nya!

description.it:
personaggio principale è colpito da una rara condizione che colpisce solo due persone in tutto il mondo, la bulimia. Organizza i suoi pasti quotidiani per sopravvivere, ma la sua speranza di sopravvivenza si affievolisce con il passare dei giorni. Consulta un medico, che gli suggerisce di giocare al gioco della realtà alternativa "Athenae", dove può mangiare quanto vuole senza ingrassare. Gioca per salvarsi la vita e crescere in forza non facendo altro che mangiare! Una vita fantastica da gourmet!

description.ja:
サクサクのチキン、伸びるチーズのピザ、夜中の1時に食べるラーメン！ ただおいしいものが食べたいだけなのに… 「暴食欠如症」どれだけ食べても食欲が満たされない奇病。 俺はこの病気のせいで体重170キロの巨漢になり、とうとう生命まで危なくなってしまう！ そこで新しい治療法として仮想現実ゲーム「アテネ」をすることに。 そこでは味が感じられて、おまけにラーメン100杯食べても太らない世界！ たくさん食べたい一心でプレイしていただけなのに、どんどんレベルアップしていって…!?

전 세계에 단 두 명만 존재하는 희귀병 폭식 결여증에 걸린 주인공. 
하루하루 살기 위해 먹는 걸 조절하며 살아가고 있지만 희망이 없어보인다, 
의사의 추천으로 시작하게 된 가상현실게임 '아테네'에서는 음식을 마음껏 먹고도 살이 찌지 않는데.
살기 위해 게임을 하며 성장하는 식도락 판타지 라이프!

Во всём мире только два человек подвержены этому редкому заболеванию.
Для того, чтобы выжить мне приходится следить за тем, что я ем. В виртуальной игре "Афины", к которой я присоединился по рекомендации врача, я никак не могу набрать вес, даже если ем до отвала.
Фантазия гурмана, где тебе приходится есть, чтобы выжить.

description.th:
คังมินฮยอก เป็นผู้ป่วยโรคกินไม่หยุด หนึ่งในโรคหายากที่มีแค่ไม่กี่คนในโลก
เขาต้องออกกำลังกายและควบคุมอาหารในแต่ละวันอย่างยากลำบากเพื่อให้มีชีวิตรอด
แต่แล้วหมอก็แนะนำวิธีการรักษาแบบใหม่ด้วยการเล่นเกมออนไลน์เสมือนจริง ""อาเธเน่"" ที่ผู้เล่นสามารถรับรู้รสชาติอาหารในเกมได้
เรื่องราวการผจญภัยแสนอร่อยชวนน้ำลายสอของมินฮยอกจึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!

description.zh:
敏赫身高185cm，他控制食量，每天运动4个小时，可他的体重却只能控制在170kg。他家境优渥、成绩优异，各方面都很完美，除了体重。这都是因为他患有罕见的暴食性缺失症。不管吃多少东西，他都无法得到满足。完美体验味觉感受的虚拟现实游戏——雅典，也许是可以解救他的最后一把钥匙？！

description.zh-hk:
主角患有全世界只有兩名患者的
罕見疾病——「暴食型飽足感缺失症」，
為了活下去，他每日努力控制飲食，
卻仍看不見希望。

在醫生的建議下，
他進入了虛擬實境遊戲《雅典奈》，
在遊戲裡，就算盡情大吃也不會變胖。
為了活下去而開始玩遊戲的他，
展開了一段美食雲集的奇幻人生!

altTitles.ja: パラレルパラダイス

altTitles.vi: Thiên đường song song tại dị giới

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.es-la: “Por favor, apareate conmigo”. En un mundo extraño, Youta Tada es atacado por una hermosa chica caballero en celo. Solamente monstruos temidos y chicas hermosas viven en este mundo.¡El único hombre es Youta Tada! ¿¡Es esto el cielo o el infierno para Youta!?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.ja: 旧・茶道部の部室を不法占拠して勝手に「ごらくぶ」の活動を続ける、悪の4人組。正義の生徒会は、ならず者どもを一掃するためについに重い腰を上げたのだった…という展開ははっきり言って全くない、まったりコミック第1巻が登場。愛が溢れまくりで、明日からも元気に生きて行けること請け合い。よ～し、パパ二度寝しちゃうぞ～!!
description.pt-br: Quatro garotas travessas ocupam ilegalmente a antiga sala do clube da Cerimônia Tradicional do Chá para criar o "Clube de Diversão". Essas atentadas... que ignoram repetidos avisos - em rebelião direta às justas diretrizes do Conselho Estudantil - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente se levantem e façam alguma coisa! Neste mangá um pouco lento, como o título sugere, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas saem de suas casas para passear juntas, com dias cheios dum pouco disso e daquilo!

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！
description.pt-br: Tokimori-san é uma mulher linda e bem-sucedida. Mas quando ela está fora do trabalho, ela tende a ficar um pouco distraída! Viver junto com a charmosa Tokimori-san sempre me deixa nervoso!

altTitles.en: Housekeeper of the Hundred Blossom Palace
Housekeeper of the Hundred Blossom Palace: Novice Court Lady Resolves the Inner Palace Intrigues

altTitles.ja: Hyakkakyu no Osoujigakari: Tenseishita Shinmai Kyuujo, Koukyuu no Onayami Kaiketsu Shimasu
百花宮のお掃除係
百花宮のお掃除係～転生した新米宮女、後宮のお悩み解決します。

description.en:
"You, that's His Majesty the Emperor, you know?!"

"Is that more important than a steamed bun?"

Yui Mei has two secrets. First, she retained the memories of her past life. Second, it is highly probable that she is a daughter of the Sai Kingdom’s Emperor.
As a certified die-hard fan of Chinese dramas in her past life, she willingly participated in the court lady selection just for the sake of seeing the imperial harem in the flesh.

title.en: Ambivalent: A World Where Losing Your Virginity Means Death

altTitles.ja: アンビバレント～童貞を捨てたら死ぬ世界～

description.en: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!
description.ja: 新種の性感染症が世界中で流行。感染すると女性は性欲が数十倍に、男性は99%が死亡する。「安易な性行為=死」となった世界。性経験のない主人公・神童貞雄は、ワクチンが開発されるまで、誰とも関係を持たないことを誓うが、女性たちの誘惑が彼を襲いーー!?

altTitles.vi: Tụi mình không có hẹn hò

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”
description.pt-br:
"Por que você continua perguntando se estamos namorando? Só estamos de mãos dadas, não estamos namorando!!"
É uma comédia romântica slice-of-life sobre casais que não são realmente casais!

altTitles.ja: アグネス仮面

description.en: Professional wrestler Yamamoto Shingo returned to Japan from a 5 year training trip in the US and Mexico, only to be greeted by his now defunct wrestling company: Yamato. He's come to find out that as soon as the president of the company passed away, the rival wrestling group Imperial Japan Pro Wrestling (IJPW) took down Yamato. Shingo is forced to seek revenge for Yamato by challenging the president of IJPW. One thing led to another, and now Shingo has been half-forced into working under IJPW as the new wrestler from Brazil: Agnes Mask.
